ticket.title: error response can't be parsed by activeresource when send as json
ticket.original-body:
If I try to use an ActiveResource object and on the server side ocures an error because of a validation or any other reason the client throws an exception with the following trace:
NoMethodError: You have a nil object when you didn't expect it! You might have expected an instance of Array. The error occurred while evaluating nil.each from /opt/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activeresource-3.0.0.beta/lib/active_resource/validations.rb:16:in `from_array' from /opt/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activeresource-3.0.0.beta/lib/active_resource/validations.rb:30:in `from_json' from /opt/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activeresource-3.0.0.beta/lib/active_resource/validations.rb:108:in `load_remote_errors' from /opt/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activeresource-3.0.0.beta/lib/active_resource/validations.rb:96:in `save_without_notifications' from /opt/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activeresource-3.0.0.beta/lib/active_resource/observing.rb:11:in `save' from /opt/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activeresource-3.0.0.beta/lib/active_resource/base.rb:681:in `create' from /opt/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activeresource-3.0.0.beta/lib/active_resource/base.rb:681:in `tap' from /opt/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activeresource-3.0.0.beta/lib/active_resource/base.rb:681:in `create' from (irb):1

version.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not been commented on for at least three months.
The resources of the Rails core team are limited, and so we are asking for your help. If you can still reproduce this error on the 3-0-stable branch or on master, please reply with all of the information you have about it and add "[state:open]" to your comment. This will reopen the ticket for review. Likewise, if you feel that this is a very important feature for Rails to include, please reply with your explanation so we can consider it.
Thank you for all your contributions, and we hope you will understand this step to focus our efforts where they are most helpful.
version.body-html:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not been commented on for at least three months.

The resources of the Rails core team are limited, and so we are asking for your help. If you can still reproduce this error on the 3-0-stable branch or on master, please reply with all of the information you have about it and add "[state:open]" to your comment. This will reopen the ticket for review. Likewise, if you feel that this is a very important feature for Rails to include, please reply with your explanation so we can consider it.

Thank you for all your contributions, and we hope you will understand this step to focus our efforts where they are most helpful.
